name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania ex rel. Kevin MARINELLI, v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Secretary, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, William S. Stickman, III, Superintendent, SCI Green. Petition of Kevin Marinelli
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Marinelli v. Beard

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania ex rel. Kevin MARINELLI, v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Secretary, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, William S. Stickman, III, Superintendent, SCI Green. Petition of Kevin Marinelli.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th. day of November, 2002, the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
812 A.2d 1164
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania ex rel. Kevin MARINELLI, v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Secretary, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, William S. Stickman, III, Superintendent, SCI Green. Petition of Kevin Marinelli.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 25, 2002.
